issue.title: www.bing.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bing.com/search?q=steam&form=QBRE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dsteam%26form%3DQBRE) ### Comment > Several elements of the Microsoft Edge search page are blocked. Search and autocomplete are also blocked. This began occurring on September 25, 2025; it previously worked perfectly with filters enabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/gjkgjwrwes8c48wssw04wks04ws88golh7asyv1pqo.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/tq7jm8wv4usowww8wg4084os8008k8075vi5eirges.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.wowhead.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.wowhead.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wowhead.com%2F) ### Comment > Pale moon не может открыть любой сайт при запущенном Adguard. Постоянно выводится сообщение "Это соединение является недоверенным". Можно пробиться несколько раз нажав кнопку обновления страницы. Это напрягает. С выключенным Adguard броузер работает нормально. ``` Username: @Юрий ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/paosp2naz6og400g8wwosoow4o0cwsc28anc5u61te.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/3pknrsjru3okk4oc8oowk0oko8cs4gkjvfew4z4fvk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 Beta 1 (5208) (CL 1.19.34, DL 2.6.8 System version: | `Windows 11 Pro, 10.0.26100 Сборка 26100` Browser: | Pale moon AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.wowhead.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wowhead.com%2F) ### Comment > Pale moon не может открыть любой сайт при запущенном Adguard. Постоянно выводится сообщение "Это соединение является недоверенным". Можно пробиться несколько раз нажав кнопку обновления страницы. Это напрягает. С выключенным Adguard броузер работает нормально. ``` Username: @Юрий ``` ### Screenshots

Block trackers,
